body:
My channel is called PlatinumGaming. I have 10 videos (5 Minecraft, 5 Pokemon,) but I hope to release a ton more soon. I don't have Avicus videos yet, but I will in the near future. I currently have 24 subscribers and hope to get many more soon! To help, please subscribe! If you already have subscribed, make sure to tell me and I will subscribe right back! The link is here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfGVQDrRu7ux4FFs-iB-Rlg

My other channel, MCPokemonerz, has one video, and yes, is an Avicus video. Make sure to check it out:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6U5bN1uvNouvn5OcJDX-rA

Thanks all for reading and I hope you enjoy my videos! Remember, subscribing and liking is what keeps channels going.
